body: Try actually repeating the default `/usr/local/cuda` when it asks you for the library path during configure. You may also have to / want to fix your library path, i. e. `export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/cuda/lib64:/usr/local/cuda/lib:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH`
